SEARCH
Package org.vladislavb.onemediatesttask.security.jwt

Class JwtService

java.lang.Object
org.vladislavb.onemediatesttask.security.jwt.JwtService
@Component public class JwtService extends Object
JwtService is a service responsible for generating, validating, and refreshing JWT tokens. It provides methods to create both authentication and refresh tokens, as well as to invalidate tokens. The service uses the JJWT library to generate and validate the tokens.
Author:
Vladislav Baryshev

      public JwtService()

  • Method Details

    • generateAuthToken

      public JwtAuthenticationDto generateAuthToken(String email)
      Generates a pair of authentication and refresh tokens for the given email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to associate with the generated tokens.
      Returns:
      a JwtAuthenticationDto containing the generated authentication and refresh tokens.

    • invalidateToken

      public void invalidateToken(String token)
      Invalidates the specified token by adding it to the list of invalidated tokens.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to invalidate.

    • isTokenInvalidated

      public boolean isTokenInvalidated(String token)
      Checks if the provided token has been invalidated.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to check.
      Returns:
      true if the token is invalidated, false otherwise.

    • refreshBaseToken

      public JwtAuthenticationDto refreshBaseToken(String email, String refreshToken)
      Refreshes the base authentication token using the provided refresh token and email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address associated with the token.
      refreshToken - the refresh token used to generate a new authentication token.
      Returns:
      a JwtAuthenticationDto containing the new authentication token and the provided refresh token.

    • getEmailFromToken

      public String getEmailFromToken(String token)
      Extracts the email address from the given JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to extract the email from.
      Returns:
      the email address encoded in the token.

    • validateJwtToken

      public boolean validateJwtToken(String token)
      Validates the provided JWT token by checking its structure and signature.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise.
